mapper.insert: insert into traffic_res_stocklog (id, res_id, order_id, adjust_num, adjust_action, adjust_time, remark, user_id, user_name, time_create, time_update) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adjustNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adjustAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjustTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update traffic_res_stocklog set res_id = #{resId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adjust_num = #{adjustNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adjust_action = #{adjustAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adjust_time = #{adjustTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_create = #{timeCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, time_update = #{timeUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, res_id, order_id, adjust_num, adjust_action, adjust_time, remark, user_id, user_name, time_create, time_update from traffic_res_stocklog where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, res_id, order_id, adjust_num, adjust_action, adjust_time, remark, user_id, user_name, time_create, time_update from traffic_res_stocklog
select res_id,adjust_num,adjust_action,adjust_time,remark,user_id,user_name from traffic_res_stocklog where res_id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and adjust_action in ('STOCK','STOCK_DISABLE')
